dt: {bc}covered with or as if with mucus {bc}{sx|slimy||}

shortdef: of, relating to, or resembling mucus
covered with or as if with mucus : slimy

dt: {bc}one that lines body cavities and passages (as of the gastrointestinal or respiratory tract) which communicate directly or indirectly with the outside of the body {bc}{sx|mucosa||}

dt.t: Pruritus and congestion involving {wi}mucous membranes{/wi} of the eyes, nose, and mouth are frequently observed, and swelling of the lips or tongue may impair swallowing and ventilation.

shortdef: a membrane rich in mucous glands; specifically : one that lines body cavities and passages (as of the gastrointestinal or respiratory tract) which communicate directly or indirectly with the outside of the body : mucosa
